title: The Dog - Joseph O'Neill.epub
description:
In this extraordinary, both comic and philosophically profound novel, the acclaimed author of Netherland uncovers the hidden contours of a glittering Middle Eastern cityâ€”and the quiet dilemmas of modernity. When our unnamed hero, a self-sabotaging and oddly existential lawyer, finds his life in New York falling apart, he seizes an opportunity to flee to Dubai, taking a mysterious job for a fabulously wealthy Lebanese family. As he struggles with his position as the â€œfamily officerâ€ of the capricious Batros brothers, he also struggles with the â€œdoghouse,â€ a condition of culpability in which he feels trapped, even as he composes endless electronic correspondenceâ€”both sent and unsentâ€”in an attempt to find a way out. 

An unforgettable fable for our globalized times, The Dog is told with Joseph Oâ€™Neillâ€™s hallmark eloquence, empathy, and stylistic mastery
